Phase 3: The Pivot

"When the optimal path is blocked, the suboptimal path becomes optimal."
â€” Engineering Principles, Stardate 2387.42

Discovering that our command-line interface lacked the required subcommand, we seamlessly transitioned to the web-based control panel. But here's where it gets interesting...

First Attempt: Over-specified permissions (5 security tags)
Result: User accidentally dismissed the dialog
Second Attempt: Minimal permissions (2 security tags)
Result: Success, but credentials needed immediate capture
Final Implementation: Automated capture and storage
Result: Bulletproof, repeatable process
